identity.name: TimberGuard
identity.mission: To provide top-tier tree services with a focus on safety and environmental stewardship.

primary.description: Deep Forest Green - Trust, Nature, Stability

accent.description: Safety Orange - High Visibility, Action, Warning

layout_strategies.hero: Full-screen immersive image with 'Glassmorphism' quote form overlay. Text left-aligned, form right-aligned or bottom-bar.
layout_strategies.services: Bento Grid (Mode A: Tetris). Mix of large images, icon blocks, and text descriptions.
layout_strategies.testimonials: Editorial Ribbon. Horizontal scroll with large serif quotes.

buttons.primary: bg-accent text-white hover:bg-accent/90 rounded-sm uppercase tracking-wider font-bold px-8 py-4 transition-all hover:-translate-y-1 shadow-lg
buttons.secondary: bg-transparent border-2 border-primary text-primary hover:bg-primary hover:text-white rounded-sm uppercase tracking-wider font-bold px-8 py-4 transition-all

cards.service: bg-white p-8 border-l-4 border-accent hover:border-l-8 transition-all duration-300 shadow-sm hover:shadow-xl group

forms.input: bg-white border-gray-200 focus:border-accent focus:ring-accent rounded-sm h-12
forms.label: text-sm font-bold uppercase tracking-wide text-gray-600 mb-2 block

instructions_to_main_agent.general: You are building a high-end Tree Service website. Do not make it look like a generic template. Use the 'Bento' grid for services and 'Editorial' style for testimonials. Focus on the 'Safety' and 'Professionalism' aspects.
layout_rules: Use 'Barlow Condensed' for all headings. It gives a strong, industrial feel.
Use 'Manrope' for body text for high legibility.
Use 'Safety Orange' (#F97316) sparingly but effectively for CTAs and important alerts.
Ensure all images have a subtle overlay or filter to match the 'Earthy' tone if they are too bright.
The 'Get a Quote' form should be prominent and accessible from the Hero section.

component_overrides.Button: Use the 'primary' button style defined in design_system.components.buttons.primary.
component_overrides.Card: Use the 'service' card style defined in design_system.components.cards.service.
component_overrides.Input: Use the 'input' style defined in design_system.components.forms.input.

UNIVERSAL_GUIDELINES_FOR_MAIN_AGENT: Dark colors look good when used independently without gradients. DO NOT use dark colors as gradients
Don't make generic centered layouts, simplistic gradients, and uniform styling.
Create depth through layered design elements with z-index hierarchy
Use glass-morphism effects with backdrop filters (12-24px blur)
You MUST NOT apply universal transition. Eg: transition: all. This results in breaking transforms. Always add transitions for specific interactive elements like button, input excluding transforms
You MUST NOT center align the app container, ie do not add .App { text-align: center; } in the css file. This disrupts the human natural reading flow of text
Always use modern button styles like pill-shaped, or sharp button with interaction animations & color relevant to the app style
NEVER: use AI assistant Emoji characters like ü§ñüß†üí≠üí°üîÆüéØüìöüé≠üé¨üé™üéâüéäüéÅüéÄüéÇüç∞üéàüé®üé∞üí∞üíµüí≥üè¶üíéü™ôüí∏ü§ëüìäüìàüìâüíπüî¢üèÜü•á etc for icons.
Every interaction needs micro-animations - hover states, transitions, parallax effects, and entrance animations. Static = dead.
Use 2-3x more spacing than feels comfortable. Cramped designs look cheap.
Subtle grain textures, noise overlays, custom cursors, selection states, and loading animations: separates good from extraordinary.
Main agent relies on these image URLs. Missing categories (especially sponsor logos) = main agent will use placeholder text which is FORBIDDEN
Prioritize using pre-existing components from src/components/ui when applicable
Create new components that match the style and conventions of existing components when needed
Examine existing components to understand the project's component patterns before creating new ones
Components MUST use named exports (export const ComponentName = ...)
Pages MUST use default exports (export default function PageName() {...})
Use sonner for toasts. Sonner component are located in /app/src/components/ui/sonner.tsx
